title: Floral Vine Embroidered Tunic
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's tunic, crafted from lightweight cotton-silk blend, featuring intricate floral vine embroidery in contrasting thread colors across the front panel and cuffs, isolated on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, no model, no mannequin, no human elements
techpack: Lightweight cotton-silk blend tunic with straight silhouette, boat neck, three-quarter sleeves, mid-thigh length. Floral vine embroidery in deep emerald, burnished gold, and rose pink threads on ivory base. Side slits for ease of movement, contrast piping along neckline. Recommended embroidery density: medium, thread type: rayon.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary commercial embroidery trends, referencing South Asian artisanal motifs adapted for modern tunic wear.
design_text:
Floral Vine Embroidered Tunic (embroidery_print_001)
Colors: ivory, deep emerald, burnished gold, rose pink
Fabrics: cotton-silk blend
Prints/Patterns: floral vine embroidery
Garment Type: tunic
Silhouette: straight
Sleeves: three-quarter length
Neckline: boat neck
Length: mid-thigh
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: embroidered front panel, embroidered sleeve cuffs, side slits, contrast piping along neckline
Techpack: available
